name: Escaping From the Killer King
description:
Info

Welcome to the Kings tower, you are trapped in here because you made something... you can't escape from this cellar is ultra protected, and guard jhon is kepping you in here. stay your etenity in here hahahahahahahaha

Controls Walk Mode

A or D: Move

F: Sets you to Preparing Mode

Preparing Mode

A or D: Changes you angle of jump

W or S: Chages the Inpulse of jump

F: Makes you Jump

Any Mode

G: Uses Power ups

Enter: Pause game

Credits Team Hop on Up

MRmorian: Codding

FSV2 (@Faculsimon): Musician

Xinjinmeng: Sprites, Sound effects and Thumbnail

Klwnny (@(✧.*(◕)-ヮ-(◕)*.✧)): Backgrounds and Tilesets

The game get the mechanics of jump king and put in Super Nintendo but with some diferences the game gets a little bit of getting over it have fun playing our game!
